info.name: Notification Service
info.description: Event-driven notification service (consumes events, no direct HTTP endpoints)

request.description:
This service is event-driven and consumes events from Redis Streams. It processes:
- Order events (ORDER_CREATED, ORDER_DELIVERED)
- Payment events (PAYMENT_SUCCESS, PAYMENT_FAILED)
- Delivery events (DELIVERY_IN_TRANSIT)

Notifications are sent automatically when these events occur.
